H0.text: Tail gets longer is the physical change that would most likely help an animal survive during winter.

H1.text: Fur gets thicker is the physical change most likely to help an animal survive during the winter.

H2.text: Feathers are shed is the physical change that would most likely help an animal survive during the winter.

H3.text: Whiskers getting shorter is a physical change that would most likely help an animal survive during the winter.
